Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to enable waitlist registrations in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights – Journeys, to ensure that spots are filled when registered attendees cancel. This feature will reach general availability on July 31, 2025.

How does this affect me?
With waitlist registrations enabled, you can ensure that spots are filled when registered attendees cancel. By setting the capacity for events and sessions, prospective attendees are placed on a waitlist when events and sessions are full. If a slot opens, the system automatically registers the next individual on the waitlist.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit the Set up and manage an event waitlist article.

Title: Dynamics 365 Customer Insights - Journeys – Set up and manage an event waitlist
